33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Umm Salamah narrated that the Prophet(s.a.w) said:"Indeed there shall come upon you A'immah whom you like (what they do) and some (of what they do) you dislike. So whoever rejects, then he is innocent, and whoever loathes, then he is safe. But whoever is pleased and follows." It was said: "O Messenger of Allah! Shall we fight them?" He said: "No, as long as they offer Salat

chapter.eng-name: When The Surface Of The Earth Is Better Than Its Belly, And When It Is Worse
